column4: 2015 send card(nee green) entered into rest june 20
column6: beloved wife of the late walter a. prior; devoted mother of dan w. (mary grimes) prior
column11: patrick (mary habestro) prior and helene (steve) lupa; cherished grandmother of 22 grandchildren
column12: 29 great-grandchildren and two great-great-grandchildren; also predeceased by one grandson; loving daughter of the late irving and helen green; dear sister of the late margaret ann (al) tymm and the late irving (connie) green; also survived by relatives and friends. relatives and friends may visit the lombardo funeral home (southtowns chapel)
column13: 3060 abbott rd. near lake ave. on thursday from 4-8 pm. a funeral service will be held at the tabernacle
